original_text: But Moses said to him, ‘Perhaps you think that I might be jealous of them. But I would be happy if the Lord would give his Spirit to all his people. I would like them all to be prophets!’
korean_text: 모세가 그에게 이르되 네가 나를 두고 시기하느냐 여호와께서 그의 영을 그의 모든 백성에게 주사 다 선지자가 되게 하시기를 원하노라

sentences.original_text: I might be jealous of them.
But I would be happy if
the Lord would give his Spirit
I would like them all to be prophets!
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들 모두가 예언자가 되기를 바랍니다!
